insert into User
nickname,
pwd,

mapper.update:
update User
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=BIGINT},
grade = #{grade,jdbcType=TINYINT},
money = #{money,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update User set nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=TINYINT}, money = #{money,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
